Summary: the buyer of the 96,800-dwt BW Pioneer is a subsidiary of Murphy Oil . the transaction includes an initial payment of $100m on delivery at the end of the current contract period on 18 March.

Title: Trio of Russian LNG cargoes head towards Asia after ship-to-ship transfers
Summary: the 174,000-cbm ice-strengthened North Moon (built 2024) is set to arrive in Asia at the end of this week .

Title: LNG carrier lay-ups set to double as number of idle ships grows
Summary: at least seven LNG carriers are now classed as in cold lay-up . talk of a similar number ready to follow .

Title: Offshore
Summary: DN Media Group is responsible for controlling your data on tradeWinds . we use your data to ensure you have a secure and enjoyable user experience when visiting our site .

Title: US FLNG project developer Delfin Midstream wins export licence extension
Summary: Floating LNG producer Delfin Midstream has got the green light to move forward on its much delayed US project . the project was granted an extension to the 13.3-mtpa .

Title: Excelerate Energy splashes out over $1bn to snap up New Fortress’ Jamaica LNG assets
Summary: Excelerate said it is paying $1.055bn in cash for the Jamaica business . these include the regasification and LNG storage facilities of the Montego Bay and Old Harbour LNG terminals . the company expects the transaction to close in the second quarter of 2025 .

Title: Venture Global fires up final investment decision process for third US LNG project
Summary: venture global is kicking off the process towards a final investment decision on its third plant, the 28-mtpa CP2 . the liquefaction producer has spent $4bn on construction, engineering and design to 31 December 2024 .

Title: Freshly listed Heidmar breaks into offshore with $100m-plus PSV deal
Summary: a document filed to a European Union tender website reveals that the Greek tanker and bulker operator has won a deal for a platform supply vessel with a maximum call-off value of €100m ($109m) a crew will run the ship to offshore platforms in the german north sea .

Title: Tariffs threat making LNG buyers hesitant on cementing long-term US deals
Summary: poten global head of business intelligence Jason Feer highlighted the retaliatory 15% tariff on LNG imports by China which has seen the country cease taking in shipments .

Title: Seapeak lays up three unemployed steam turbine LNG carriers
Summary: three steam turbine LNG carriers have redelivered from long-term charters . they may sell them in 2025 . stonepeak infrastructure Partners-controlled Seapeak has put them in lay-up .

Title: ExxonMobil presses pause on LNG bunker vessels in China ahead of US port fee hearings
Summary: energy major ExxonMobil has allowed newbuilding berths for a series of LNG bunker vessels in china to lapse ahead of the US firming up its proposals to slap fees on Chinese-built ships calling at its ports .

Title: SSY opens Aberdeen office staffed with ex-Clarksons offshore brokers
Summary: SSY is opening a new office in Aberdeen to target offshore support business in the north sea . Jamie Gordon and Myles MacKintosh will head the new office by mid-2025 .

Title: EU ban on Russian LNG cargo transshipment kicks in
Summary: ban on transshipment of Russian LNG in european ports for onward export to third countries comes into force today . the EU measures also prohibit providing technical support, brokerage services and financing for transshipments operations .

Title: LNG-fuel retrofit market may emerge as gap-filler to greener options, Lloyd’s Register says
Summary: a market for retrofitting vessels could emerge once shipowners have clearer visibility on how best to equip their vessels to access green fuels and meet regulatory requirements . that is the conclusion of Lloyd’s Register's update to a 2023 report on engine retrofits .
